Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Component
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the component of a course. Component includes: exam and all CAs. A course can have only one component.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CA getCa()
      Gets the CA object which stores information of all CAs of a course.
      double getExamWeightage()
      Gets weightage of exam with respect to the total mark of a course.
      int getNumOfCAs()
      Gets the number of CAs of a course.
      void printComponents()
      Prints the name and component weightage of a course.
